featured.text: Besides, chocolate contains tannins, which help to kill some of the bacteria in the mouth.
They help bacteria to produce tannins.
According to the passage, which of the following is true of tannins? (A)

definition.zh_def: 單寧是一種存在於植物中的多酚化合物，通常用於製作皮革和作為食品中的防腐劑。
definition.en_def: Tannin is a polyphenolic compound found in plants, commonly used in leather production and as a preservative in food.
definition.example: Red wine contains tannins that can give it a dry taste.
